verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim Now these [are] the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עָל֛וּ <WH5927> 'a-Lu that went up עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with זְרֻבָּבֶ֥ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel with Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵ֖ל <WH7597> she-'al-ti-'El of Shealtiel וְיֵשׁ֑וּעַ <WH3442> ve-ye-Shu-a'; and Jeshua שְׂרָיָ֥ה <WH8304> se-ra-Yah Seraiah יִרְמְיָ֖ה <WH3414> yir-me-Yah Jeremiah עֶזְרָֽא׃ <WH5830> 'ez-Ra. Ezra
אֲמַרְיָ֥ה <WH568> 'a-mar-Yah Amariah מַלּ֖וּךְ <WH4409> mal-Luch Malluch חַטּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH2407> chat-Tush. Hattush
שְׁכַנְיָ֥ה <WH7935> she-chan-Yah Shechaniah רְחֻ֖ם <WH7348> re-Chum Rehum מְרֵמֹֽת׃ <WH4822> me-re-Mot. Meremoth
עִדּ֥וֹא <WH5714> id-Do Iddo גִנְּת֖וֹי <WH1599> gin-ne-To Ginnetho אֲבִיָּֽה׃ <WH29> 'a-vi-Yah. Abijah
מִיָּמִ֥ין <WH4326> mi-ya-Min Miamin מַֽעַדְיָ֖ה <WH4573> ma-'ad-Yah Maadiah בִּלְגָּֽה׃ <WH1083> bil-Gah. Bilgah
שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <WH8098> she-ma'-Yah Shemaiah וְיוֹיָרִ֖יב <WH3114> ve-yo-ya-Riv and Joiarib יְדַֽעְיָֽה׃ <WH3048> ye-Da'-Yah. Jedaiah

סַלּ֣וּ <WH5543> sal-Lu Sallu עָמ֔וֹק <WH5987> a-Mok, Amok חִלְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2518> chil-ki-Yah Hilkiah יְדַֽעְיָ֑ה <WH3048> ye-da'-Yah; Jedaiah אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These רָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> ra-Shei These [were] the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> va-'a-chei-Hem and of their brethren בִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> bi-Mei in the days יֵשֽׁוּעַ׃ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a'. of Jeshua פ Peh

וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim, Moreover the Levites יֵשׁ֧וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua בִּנּ֛וּי <WH1131> bin-Nui Binnui קַדְמִיאֵ֥ל <WH6934> kad-mi-'El Kadmiel שֵׁרֵבְיָ֖ה <WH8274> she-re-ve-Yah Sherebiah יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah מַתַּנְיָ֑ה <WH4983> mat-tan-Yah; [and] Mattaniah עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- charge הֻיְּד֖וֹת <WH1960> h-ye-Dot [which was] over the thanksgiving ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he וְאֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> ve-'e-Chav he and his brethren

וּבַקְבֻּֽקְיָ֨ה <WH1229> u-vak-buk-Yah Also Bakbukiah; וְעֻנֹּו ve-'un-nov כוְעֻנִּ֧י <WH6042> ve-'un-Ni Unni קאֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem their brethren לְנֶגְדָּ֖ם <WH5048> le-neg-Dam opposite לְמִשְׁמָרֽוֹת׃ <WH4931> le-mish-ma-Rot. [were] over against them in the watches

וְיֵשׁ֖וּעַ <WH3442> ve-ye-Shu-a' And Jeshua הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֽוֹיָקִ֑ים <WH3113> yo-ya-Kim; Joiakim וְיֽוֹיָקִים֙ <WH3113> ve-yo-ya-Kim Joiakim הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid also begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶלְיָשִׁ֔יב <WH475> 'el-ya-Shiv, Eliashib וְאֶלְיָשִׁ֖יב <WH475> ve-'el-ya-Shiv and Eliashib אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹיָדָֽע׃ <WH3111> yo-ya-Da'. Joiada

וְיוֹיָדָע֙ <WH3111> ve-yo-ya-Da' And Joiada הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3129> yo-na-Tan, Jonathan וְיוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3129> ve-yo-na-Tan and Jonathan הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יַדּֽוּעַ׃ <WH3037> yad-Du-a'. Jaddua

וּבִימֵי֙ <WH3117> u-vi-Mei And in the days יֽוֹיָקִ֔ים <WH3113> yo-ya-Kim, of Joiakim הָי֥וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become כֹהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> cho-ha-Nim were priests רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei the chief הָאָב֑וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot; of the fathers לִשְׂרָיָ֣ה <WH8304> lis-ra-Yah of Seraiah מְרָיָ֔ה <WH4811> me-ra-Yah, Meraiah לְיִרְמְיָ֖ה <WH3414> le-yir-me-Yah of Jeremiah חֲנַנְיָֽה׃ <WH2608> cha-nan-Yah. Hananiah
לְעֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> le-'ez-Ra Of Ezra מְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam, Meshullam לַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> la-'a-mar-Yah of Amariah יְהוֹחָנָֽן׃ <WH3076> ye-ho-cha-Nan. Jehohanan
לִמְלוּכִי lim-lu-chi כלִמְלִ֙יכוּ֙ <WH4409> lim-Li-chu Malluch קיֽוֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3129> yo-na-Tan, Jonathan לִשְׁבַנְיָ֖ה <WH7645> lish-van-Yah of Shebaniah יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> yo-Sef. Joseph
לְחָרִ֣ם <WH2766> le-cha-Rim Of Harim עַדְנָ֔א <WH5733> 'ad-Na, Adna לִמְרָי֖וֹת <WH4812> lim-ra-Yot of Meraioth חֶלְקָֽי׃ <WH2517> chel-Kai. Helkai
לַעֲדָיָא la-'a-da-ya כלְעִדֹּ֥וא <WH5714> le-'id-Do Iddo קזְכַרְיָ֖ה <WH2148> ze-char-Yah Zechariah לְגִנְּת֥וֹן <WH1599> le-gin-ne-Ton of Ginnethon מְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <WH4918> me-shul-Lam. Meshullam

לַאֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> la-'a-vi-Yah Of Abijah זִכְרִ֑י <WH2147> zich-Ri; Zichri לְמִ֨נְיָמִ֔ין <WH4509> le-Min-ya-Min, of Miniamin לְמוֹעַדְיָ֖ה <WH4153> le-mo-'ad-Yah of Moadiah פִּלְטָֽי׃ <WH6408> pil-Tai. Piltai
לְבִלְגָּ֣ה <WH1083> le-vil-Gah Of Bilgah שַׁמּ֔וּעַ <WH8051> sham-Mu-a', Shammua לִֽשְׁמַעְיָ֖ה <WH8098> lish-ma'-Yah of Shemaiah יְהוֹנָתָֽן׃ <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan. Jehonathan
וּלְיוֹיָרִ֣יב <WH3114> u-le-yo-ya-Riv And of Joiarib מַתְּנַ֔י <WH4982> mat-te-Nai, Mattenai לִֽידַֽעְיָ֖ה <WH3048> li-da'-Yah of Jedaiah עֻזִּֽי׃ <WH5813> 'uz-Zi. Uzzi
לְסַלַּ֥י <WH5543> le-sal-Lai Of Sallai קַלָּ֖י <WH7040> kal-Lai Kallai לְעָמ֥וֹק <WH5987> le-'a-Mok of Amok עֵֽבֶר׃ <WH5677> 'E-ver. Eber
לְחִלְקִיָּ֣ה <WH2518> le-chil-ki-Yah Of Hilkiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <WH2811> cha-shav-Yah, Hashabiah לִֽידַֽעְיָ֖ה <WH3048> li-da'-Yah of Jedaiah נְתַנְאֵֽל׃ <WH5417> ne-tan-'El. Nethaneel

הַלְוִיִּם֩ <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim The Levites בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> bi-Mei in the days אֶלְיָשִׁ֜יב <WH475> 'el-ya-Shiv of Eliashib יוֹיָדָ֤ע <WH3111> yo-ya-Da' Joiada וְיוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3110> ve-yo-cha-Nan and Johanan וְיַדּ֔וּעַ <WH3037> ve-yad-Du-a', and Jaddua כְּתוּבִ֖ים <WH3789> ke-tu-Vim [were] recorded רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei chief אָב֑וֹת <WH1> a-Vot; of the fathers וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> ve-hak-Ko-ha-Nim, also the priests עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in מַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> mal-Chut to the reign דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <WH1867> da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַפָּֽרְסִֽי׃ <WH6542> hap-Pa-re-Si. the Persian פ Peh

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons לֵוִי֙ <WH3878> le-Vi of Levi רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot, of the fathers כְּתוּבִ֕ים <WH3789> ke-tu-Vim [were] written עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in סֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer in the book דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> div-Rei of the chronicles הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim; even until the days וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- up יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> ye-Mei to the days יֽוֹחָנָ֥ן <WH3110> yo-cha-Nan of Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶלְיָשִֽׁיב׃ <WH475> 'el-ya-Shiv. of Eliashib

וְרָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ve-ra-Shei And the chief הַ֠לְוִיִּם <WH3881> Hal-vi-yim of the Levites חֲשַׁבְיָ֨ה <WH2811> cha-shav-Yah Hashabiah שֵֽׁרֵבְיָ֜ה <WH8274> she-re-ve-Yah Sherebiah וְיֵשׁ֤וּעַ <WH3442> ve-ye-Shu-a' and Jeshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קַדְמִיאֵל֙ <WH6934> kad-mi-'El of Kadmiel וַאֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <WH251> va-'a-chei-Hem with their brethren לְנֶגְדָּ֔ם <WH5048> le-neg-Dam, opposite לְהַלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> le-hal-Lel over against them to praise לְהוֹד֔וֹת <WH3034> le-ho-Dot, [and] to give thanks בְּמִצְוַ֖ת <WH4687> be-mitz-Vat according to the commandment דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> da-Vid of David אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God מִשְׁמָ֖ר <WH4929> mish-Mar ward לְעֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat over against מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH4929> mish-Mar. ward

מַתַּנְיָ֧ה <WH4983> mat-tan-Yah Mattaniah וּבַקְבֻּֽקְיָ֛ה <WH1229> u-vak-buk-Yah and Bakbukiah עֹבַדְיָ֥ה <WH5662> 'oad-Yah Obadiah מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam Meshullam טַלְמ֣וֹן <WH2929> tal-Mon Talmon עַקּ֑וּב <WH6126> 'ak-Kuv; Akkub שֹׁמְרִ֤ים <WH8104> sho-me-Rim keeping שֽׁוֹעֲרִים֙ <WH7778> sho-'a-Rim [were] porters מִשְׁמָ֔ר <WH4929> mish-Mar, the ward בַּאֲסֻפֵּ֖י <WH624> ba-'a-sup-Pei at the thresholds הַשְּׁעָרִֽים׃ <WH8179> hash-she-'a-Rim. of the gates

אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בִּימֵ֛י <WH3117> bi-Mei These [were] in the days יוֹיָקִ֥ים <WH3113> yo-ya-Kim of Joiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' of Jeshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹצָדָ֑ק <WH3136> yo-tza-Dak; of Jozadak וּבִימֵי֙ <WH3117> u-vi-Mei and in the days נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <WH5166> ne-chem-Yah of Nehemiah הַפֶּחָ֔ה <WH6346> hap-pe-Chah, the governor וְעֶזְרָ֥א <WH5830> ve-'ez-Ra and of Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest הַסּוֹפֵֽר׃ <WH5608> has-so-Fer. the scribe פ Peh

וּבַחֲנֻכַּ֞ת <WH2598> u-va-cha-nuk-Kat And at the dedication חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> cho-Mat of the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem בִּקְשׁ֤וּ <WH1245> bik-Shu they sought אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim the Levites מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all מְק֣וֹמֹתָ֔ם <WH4725> me-Ko-mo-Tam, out of all their places לַהֲבִיאָ֖ם <WH935> la-ha-vi-'Am to bring לִֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> li-ru-sha-Lim; them to Jerusalem לַעֲשֹׂ֨ת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to keep חֲנֻכָּ֤ה <WH2598> cha-nuk-Kah the dedication וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <WH8057> ve-sim-Chah with gladness וּבְתוֹד֣וֹת <WH8426> u-ve-to-Dot both with thanksgivings וּבְשִׁ֔יר <WH7892> u-ve-Shir, and with singing מְצִלְתַּ֖יִם <WH4700> me-tzil-Ta-yim [with] cymbals נְבָלִ֥ים <WH5035> ne-va-Lim psalteries וּבְכִנֹּרֽוֹת׃ <WH3658> u-ve-chin-no-Rot. and with harps

וַיֵּאָ֣סְפ֔וּ <WH622> vai-ye-'A-se-Fu, gathered themselves together בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei And the sons הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <WH7891> ham-sho-re-Rim; of the singers וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- from הַכִּכָּר֙ <WH3603> hak-kik-Kar both out of the plain country סְבִיב֣וֹת <WH5439> se-vi-Vot round about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- and from חַצְרֵ֖י <WH2691> chatz-Rei and from the villages נְטֹפָתִֽי׃ <WH5200> ne-to-fa-Ti. of Netophathi

וּמִבֵּית֙ <WH1004> u-mib-Beit Also from the house הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal, Gilgal וּמִשְּׂד֥וֹת <WH7704> u-mis-se-Dot and out of the fields גֶּ֖בַע <WH1387> Ge-va' of Geba וְעַזְמָ֑וֶת <WH5820> ve-'az-Ma-vet; and Azmaveth כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki themselves חֲצֵרִ֗ים <WH2691> cha-tze-Rim, them villages בָּנ֤וּ <WH1129> ba-Nu had builded לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> la-Hem for הַמְשֹׁ֣רֲרִ֔ים <WH7891> ham-Sho-ra-Rim, for the singers סְבִיב֖וֹת <WH5439> se-vi-Vot round about יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. Jerusalem

וַיִּֽטַּהֲר֔וּ <WH2891> vai-yit-ta-ha-Ru, purified הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim And the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim; and the Levites וַֽיְטַהֲרוּ֙ <WH2891> vay-ta-ha-Ru themselves and purified אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, the people וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשְּׁעָרִ֖ים <WH8179> hash-she-'a-Rim and the gates וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <WH2346> ha-cho-Mah. and the wall

וָאַעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> va-'a-'a-Leh Then I brought up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei the princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al of לַחוֹמָ֑ה <WH2346> la-cho-Mah; upon the wall וָאַעֲמִ֡ידָה <WH5975> va-'a-'a-Mi-dah and appointed שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei two תוֹדֹת֩ <WH8426> to-Dot [companies of them that gave] thanks גְּדוֹלֹ֨ת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot great וְתַהֲלֻכֹ֤ת <WH8418> ve-ta-ha-lu-Chot [whereof one] went לַיָּמִין֙ <WH3225> lai-ya-Min on the right hand מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al of לַחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> la-cho-Mah, upon the wall לְשַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> le-Sha-'ar gate הָאַשְׁפֹּֽת׃ <WH830> ha-'ash-Pot. toward the dung

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech along אַחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem And after הוֹשַׁ֣עְיָ֔ה <WH1955> ho-Sha'-Yah, Hoshaiah וַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and half שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> sa-Rei of the princes יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> u-vin-ya-Min, and Benjamin וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֖ה <WH8098> u-she-ma'-Yah and Shemaiah וְיִרְמְיָֽה׃ <WH3414> ve-yir-me-Yah. and Jeremiah ס sa-Mek
